ingredients.ingredient: ¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper

cookingTips: Season pork chops simply and brown them first in a skillet to develop a golden crust
Layer with sautéed onions and mushrooms before adding soup to build depth of flavor
Simmer gently until pork is cooked through and sauce reduces slightly to coat the chops
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through making comforting pork chops by searing them until golden, then simmering in a creamy mushroom soup with sautéed aromatics for a cozy, restaurant-quality dish.
